faq.title: Pricing FAQs
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal.
faq.q3: Do you offer discounts for annual payment?
faq.a3: Yes, we offer a 20% discount when you choose annual billing on any of our plans.
faq.q4: What happens when my free trial ends?
faq.a4: When your trial period ends, your account will automatically convert to the selected plan. We'll send you a reminder before it ends.
